clinical_history: Follow-up PET-CT after chemotherapy to assess treatment response.
findings: Focal uptake in spleen consistent with post-surgical changes.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
Focal increased uptake in spleen, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in spleen with SUVmax 3.34.
recommendations: Repeat PET-CT in 3–6 months to monitor treatment response.
